rows.IONWAVE TRADE EXECUTION TRACKER: Single view. Where does the whole thing stand. How do we know it's done.
This is the master tracker for the entire IonWave Trade.
Every major milestone lives here. One row = one thing that needs to happen.
The VERIFICATION column is the most important column. It answers: how does a stranger know this is done?
Status: Not Started → In Progress → Done → Verified
Verified means someone checked the output against the verification criteria and it passed.

rows.col_8: Verification: How We Know It’s Done
Job is live on Upwork. Test task is attached. Screening criteria match VA Hiring Kit tab 2.
5+ applicants reviewed against checklist. Test task sent to top 3. Results logged in pipeline tracker.
VA contracted. Handoff Checklist (Kit tab 7) sent. VA confirms receipt and understanding. Kickoff call done.
Job live on target platforms. Posting matches CoS JD. Test task attached. VA confirms in daily update.
Pipeline tracker updated daily. Screening checklist applied to each. 5+ candidates advanced to interview. Zero unqualified candidates slipped through.
Assessment Workbook completed per candidate. Decision log has rationale. References checked.
Offer accepted. Contract signed. Start date confirmed. Onboarding packet sent.
Recruiter contracted. Retainer paid. Recruiter has Operator JD + assessment rubric + onboarding packet. Kickoff call done.
Pipeline of 10+ qualified candidates. Each screened against Operator rubric. Top 3-5 advanced to Nilo interview.
Assessment completed per candidate. Essay response reviewed. Culture fit evaluated. Decision log updated.
Contract signed (equity, vesting, milestones, IP, termination). Start date confirmed. Start Here Complete sent.

rows.col_2: Operator onboards using Start Here Complete
rows.col_8: Operator has read Start Here Complete. Can explain the business in own words. Has access to all systems. Onboarding checklist 100% complete.

rows.IONWAVE TRADE EXECUTION TRACKER: PHASE 1: TABLE SET — Everything Ready to Launch (Weeks 11-15)

rows.col_8: Verification: How We Know It’s Done

rows.col_2: Entity formed (LLC filed, EIN, bank account)
rows.col_8: LLC formation docs in hand. EIN letter received. Bank account open with Operator as signer. Cap table matches contract.
Final formula approved. Taste/dissolution test passed. Certificate of analysis from manufacturer. 3 team members tried it.
Label compliant (FDA supplement facts, required disclaimers). Design matches brand. Print proof approved. Initial run ordered.
Units in warehouse or 3PL. QC check on 5% of units. SKUs in Shopify. Inventory count matches PO.
Domain connected. Product pages with photos and copy. Checkout flow tested (place test order). Payment processing confirmed. Pixel firing.
Signed agreement. Credential verified. Available for VSL production. Agreed to likeness usage terms.
Both scripts follow 12-block architecture. Read-aloud test passed (<4 min or <15 min depending on format). Nilo approved.
Videos finished. Captions burned in. CTA clear. 9:16 + 1:1 + 16:9 exports. Quality above minimum bar.
Page live. Looks like content not ad. Educates on problem. Links to VSL/sales page. Mobile-optimized.
5 distinct hooks. Each follows a framework from Hook Library. Short-form (<30s). Thumbnail selected. Ready to upload.

rows.col_2: Klaviyo account set up, core flows built
rows.col_8: Welcome, Abandoned Cart, Post-Purchase, and Replenishment flows live. Each has 3+ emails with copy written. Test sends passed.
Business Manager set up. Pixel installed and firing (test confirmed). Payment method added. Campaign structure ready.
ALL items 1.1-1.12 verified. Could take a real order today and fulfill it. A stranger could click an ad, watch the VSL, buy, and receive product.
Verification: How We Know It’s Done
Campaigns live. 2 VSL variants running. 2 ad sets each (broad + interest). Budget confirmed. Monitoring hourly Day 1.
50 orders shipped within SLA. Zero fulfillment errors. Tracking sent to all customers. Post-purchase email triggered.
5 hooks tested at $20-30 each. Hook rates logged in VSL Iteration Log. Winner identified (>25% hook rate). Losers killed.
CPA trending toward target. If >2x after $500 spend, body test or offer test initiated per VSL Testing Protocol.
5+ reviews on site via Loox/Judge.me. Review solicitation flow firing. Photo reviews bonus.
At least 1 customer bought twice. Replenishment flow firing. Subscription offer sent.
Revenue confirmed. Funnel works end to end. CPA trending toward viable. Customers exist and are being retained.

rows.IONWAVE TRADE EXECUTION TRACKER: PHASE 3: WINNER FOUND — Profitable Unit Economics (Weeks 19-27)

rows.col_8: Verification: How We Know It’s Done
One VSL variant has CPA at target with >25% hook rate at $200/day spend. Logged in Iteration Log.
Multi-bottle tiers live. AOV meets target. Upsell flow converting at >5%. Best offer locked.
CPA at or below target sustained for 7+ days at $200/day. ROAS >2.5x. Logged in weekly report.
ReCharge configured. Subscribe-and-save on product pages. Subscription offer in email flows. First subscribers active.
60-day cohort data shows repeat rate >20%. LTV projection exceeds 2x CAC. Logged in CRM Metrics Dashboard.
Audiences built by lifecycle stage. Stage-specific creative running. Retargeting CPA measured separately.
Profitable unit economics at $200/day. Winning creative, winning offer, winning audience identified. Ready to scale.
Verification: How We Know It’s Done
CPA stays within 20% of test CPA at higher spend. Revenue scaling proportionally. Creative fatigue monitored.
New VSL with new angle. Prevents creative fatigue. Tests against incumbent. Winner takes over.
Roles engineered per 7-dimension framework. Growth person, retention person, ops person. Enrolled in School Model.
Every automation in Lifecycle Automations tab is built, tested, and firing in Klaviyo. Metrics tracked per automation.
Referral mechanism live. VIP customers invited. Share rate >10%. First referred purchases tracked.
Shopify shows $50K+ in trailing 30 days. Margin positive. Not a spike — sustained over 2+ months.
Shopify shows $100K+ in trailing 30 days. Positive net margin for 2+ consecutive months. Team running all 6 programs.
All Graduation Criteria tab thresholds met. Trade Grade A sustained 2 semesters. Business runs without Studio input.
